content: In PR #16687, lemmas tagged with @[to_additive] could not be changed to private lemmas without explicitly naming the additivized lemmas. It was suggested that this might be a bug in @[to_additive].
Why would you want to make this lemma private?
About the bug: I agree that this is a bug, but I guess it will be a low priority.

Yury G. Kudryashov said:

Why would you want to make this lemma private?

Sorry to be unclear. The lemma for which this bug occurred is not the one in the current file--the bug happened for two lemmas which were edited out in the review process. The lemmas held for topological groups in general, so it was suggested they should not be in the NonarchimedeanGroup namespace, but should instead either be moved to the TopologicalGroup file or changed to private lemmas.
